Key Match Events: Sri Lanka beat West Indies by 5 wickets
Nishan Madushka and Sadeera Samarawickrama laid a crucial platform
Charith Asalanka took charge and made sure there were no hiccups, scoring an unbeaten 62 off 61 balls
Gudakesh Motie was the shining light for West Indies with 40 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Charith Asalanka said the series win is huge and the guys deserved it
Shai Hope of West Indies said it was a disappointing performance and they need to bat better in the Powerplay and play spin better
Maheesh Theekshana was named Man of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka won the match with 5 wickets
The presentation ceremony was delayed due to rain
The match was played at Rangiri Dambulla International Stadium, Dambulla
